newsitem.title: YUGOSLAVIA: Serbian fin.min meets World Bank mission - paper.
newsitem.headline: Serbian fin.min meets World Bank mission - paper.

text.p: Serbian Finance Minister Dusan Vlatkovic has met a World Bank mission, the first to arrive in Belgrade in five years, the Belgrade daily Politika reported on Wednesday.
Preliminary talks dealt with issues aimed at Yugoslavia renewing cooperation with the World Bank, Politika quoted a statement from the Serbian Information Ministry as saying.
Talks focused on privatisation, improvement of the banking sector, fiscal policy and public spending as part of state and local budgets, social, health and unemployment funds, the statement said.

Serbian finance and other relevant ministries will prepare reports needed for further decisions on Yugoslavia's reintegration with international financial institutions, the paper said. -- Gordana Filipovic, Belgrade newsroom, +381 11 222 4254
